description.narrative: This intervention will be implemented by, Kifiya Financial Technology (Kifiya), which had successfully completed a Foundation funded innovative project that aimed at building a digital payment ecosystem by supporting agricultural actors along the value chain to switch from risky and expensive cash handling processes to digital payments. Kifiya will create meaningful and dignified work opportunities for 178,100 young Ethiopians through ‘eCommerce MSME Market Place’. The project will build access to markets and working capital and enable digital payments for MSMEs across agriculture, tourism, retail and accompanying sectors such as logistics and other services.

participating-org.narrative: Kifiya Financial Technology Private Limited Company
